comment.body: @ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: ok, i will add it into that topic, 1 more thing I am facing now is for new user, when they join my hub, they can only see post in my hub, an old user joined faffiehub already, if this old user comment on a post in my hub, then it will appear to all my new users, but if this old user create a new post, all my new users cannot see it, because it is in kaffiehub which my new users have not downloaded yet. BUT if my new users follow this old user, then it will sync the kaffiehub into new users folder also, which cause my new users to see all the data which is not related to my hub :(
